title: well.. I am back with some news
body: Hi guys! I posted a post that talked about how I got major I said MAJOR depression from playing league. it was because of lack of support and friendship. I was supported by 4 people who said there is a way out of depression and one who said just kill yourself. I have four options for you guys. And major depression has caused 11 suicide attempts and 31 suicide plans...

replies.body:
This world if full of every sort of person ever possible. Of course you'll meet people who just want everyone else to die.

But damn, not all of us are like that. In fact, when you meet someone like that you should strive to try and show them a better outlook.

I'll support you, whatever you mean by that. This is purely text-based chat so I can't really do anything like emotional comfort or soft lullabies.

you are awesome and this game has many bonusness if you are having trouble in ranked trieda different mode also dont let this get you down mate
you are meant to play to enjoy yourself
i understand what you are going thru and i hope i helped even a little 
keep being awesome

thanks man! I dont have trouble with ranked sometimes the game becomes a dark like hole when people haye you. I have curruntly planned a suicide plan but it wont be happening any time soon and also I nerver talk in game chat making people mad and I dont rage. (I hope I gave you a better understanding)

1. Should I give up?
2. Help will come
3. You'll be fine
4. We support you 
(Bouns)
5. We dont care
